{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":1572,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230716/2023071608595481585090.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230716/2023071608595524075091.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D56  一张纸中总有几个显眼包线条不肯老实地排好队，活在线条群却不肯融入线条群。56天拉了整整100张线条，期待量变引起质变的那天","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230715/2023071508381704925642.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230715/2023071508381744972548.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D55  凉快的早晨冰凉的美式和写字更般配，横线和竖线都有小小的进步。风乍起，合当奋意向人生！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230714/2023071408374784679010.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230714/2023071408374807187951.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D54  竖线宝宝们今天很听话，队伍排的很整齐。发现几个大佬打卡都好早，果然是大佬，我也要卷起来","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230713/2023071308450813476868.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230713/2023071308450754994042.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D53  这几天雨下得有点大纸可能有些受潮了，洇纸特别厉害。我大概是被虐的时间久了，竟然不觉得洇纸会影响心情照旧专注拉线条，“是故非淡薄无以明德，非宁静无以致远”。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230712/2023071208470470065783.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230712/2023071208470483675819.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D52  莫道桑榆晚，为霞尚满天。今天的横线让人舒服，果然常总结常进步","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230711/2023071108345340023780.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230711/2023071108345365820848.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D51  慢品人间烟火色，闲观万事岁月长。一瓶500毫升的墨用到最后了突然开始洇纸了，挑战总是无处不在，饶是如此仍然坚持把每个线条拉直才能不被打乱节奏","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230710/2023071009073052118570.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230710/2023071009072995090823.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D50 生活总是来来往往，千万别等来日方长。抓住当下的每一分钟，做自己最喜欢的事（今天按照昨天的总结改正后发现横线确实好了一点，竖线我可能用力有些大了要控制下）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230709/2023070911241445123171.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230709/2023070911241449521870.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D49  打卡七七四十九天，武侠小说里大侠们闭关修炼都要经历的阶段哎。我的闭关修炼也小小总结一下：起笔和收笔已经有了很大的进步，呼吸节奏和运笔节奏慢慢同步，横线和竖线越来越直，最大的不足还是运笔中有些着急了，快要收尾时会着急导致后半部分歪。我已经养成了不打卡不能安心做其他事的习惯，期待九九八十一天的闭关成果（今天的墨汁忽浓忽淡的）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230708/2023070803095480016887.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230708/2023070803095478020584.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D48  早起带娃上课赶早市买菜，下午还有工作要忙，只能选择中午状态最差的时候练习了，果然被横线打击到了。今天总结了一下，横线两头翘中间弯的原因可能是重心有点往左偏导致手腕角度有问题，明天接着摸索","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230707/2023070709080852091733.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230707/2023070709080890290403.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D47 早起练习有些着急了，起笔藏锋时笔锋总是像个调皮的孩子把头伸出来，小暑了一年中最热的时候马上到了，惦记着户外工作的老妈有些分神了，看到日历又想起今天是七七事变86周年，心浮气躁的一天呀","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":1879,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230706/2023070608285303547904.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230706/202307060828530844817.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230706/2023070608285353313264.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D46 当自律变成一种本能的习惯，你就会享受到它的快乐（毛毡上的印记算不算力透纸背🤔 ）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230705/2023070508140245090509.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230705/2023070508140268952674.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230705/2023070508140261235412.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D45今天的线条宝宝们很听话，队伍排得很整齐（起笔蓄势后一定要及时调整手腕的角度）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230704/202307040828555425482.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230704/2023070408285542819340.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1960,"height":4569,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230704/2023070408285490748592.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D44  成为大佬的第一步就是尽力拉好每一根线条💪 ","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230703/2023070308025310146661.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2953,"height":4575,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230703/2023070308025308187523.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2389,"height":4575,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230703/202307030802532734046.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D43新的一周从一根笔直圆润又干净的竖线开始，虽然能写好的不多，但每根优秀的线条都在告诉我，我一直在进步。昨晚临睡前学会两个词语——不啻微芒，造炬成阳。与大家共勉。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230702/2023070208420103215972.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230702/2023070208421616782236.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230702/2023070208420112373219.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D42  又是早起打卡的一天，清凉的风吹散了燥热，换了多年前买的纸突然发现这么好用。单钩执笔和五指执笔各练习了一段时间，还是单钩执笔更能拉直线。今天要去看望姥姥和姥爷，给神兽安排好假期作业陪练古筝，买菜做饭打扫卫生，最后备课。成年人的每一天只有极少的时间是能够真正属于自己的，希望每一秒都不要浪费（我真是越来越唠叨了🤭 ）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230701/2023070108471418096874.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230701/2023070108471397516278.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1200,"height":1200,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230701/2023070108471299139347.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D41   早起配一杯冰咖啡+五分钟八段锦+两张横线竖线，无比满足。七月的第一天是元气满满的开始，自律真的很治愈。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230630/2023063002115428075612.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230630/2023063002115409865799.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D40  着急去给神兽开家长会，心不在焉的画了一张，先打卡晚上接着练","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230629/202306290502471149780.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1020,"height":1080,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230629/2023062905024614556617.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D39心可以累手不能停，该干什么干什么，在崩溃中继续前行","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230628/2023062810353856446458.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230628/2023062810353829668948.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230628/2023062810353844346700.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D38  神兽放假了，今天是做好妈妈的一天，陪吃陪喝陪玩。打发了神兽，继续驯服这支狼毫","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230627/2023062701590875371374.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230627/2023062701590842223045.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230627/2023062701590836840249.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D37  自能生羽翼，何必仰云梯     远大的抱负，从驯服一支毛笔开始，冲！\n\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230626/2023062602151203377835.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230626/2023062602151215916644.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1020,"height":1080,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230626/2023062602151063324700.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D36总结一下今天状态差的原因
①换了一支狼毫笔，墨汁胶太厚（甩锅哈哈）
②呼吸和提按的节奏不合拍
③手腕僵硬，肩膀没打开
④重心不稳
加油，冲！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230625/2023062501441550095786.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230625/2023062501441585779198.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1020,"height":1080,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230625/2023062501441475364364.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D35烟火人间，各有遗憾。今天比昨天好，这就是希望","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230624/2023062402582781237433.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230624/2023062402582761876902.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1020,"height":1080,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230624/202306240258266921219.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D34学会了以正确的方式焦虑，就学到了终极奥义。毛边纸倒数十张。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230623/2023062304352956367316.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230623/2023062304352932055284.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1020,"height":1080,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230623/202306230435279088819.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D33在姑娘摇的稀碎的古筝声中可以平心静气的练习，我也太厉害了吧","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230622/202306220622234177137.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230622/2023062206222352821856.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D32我的笔和墨都是凉的，为什么纸皱了呢？哦，原来我练习的心是热的，把纸烫皱了\n祝大家端午安康","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230621/2023062112111163376165.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230621/202306211211115039963.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230621/2023062112111181621607.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D32夏至啦，祝大家夏至快乐，这个夏天没有忧愁只有快乐\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230620/202306200246215195081.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230620/2023062002462147530898.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230620/2023062002462128486054.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D30又是一个拯救强迫症的整数。今天发现月初买的70张毛边纸又进入了倒数20张，一瓶500毫升的墨悄悄滴就没了大半，架子上的毛笔不知不觉就挂满了。一直抱怨女儿的古筝课好贵，原来我的爱好也这么烧钱，哈哈","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230619/2023061904193136498363.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230619/2023061904193137771212.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230619/2023061904193096680292.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D29“自信不是认为自己永远比别人好，而是意识到自己不需要和其他人作比较”\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230618/20230618055221244684.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230618/2023061805522142820399.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230618/202306180552212507703.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D28  别人开导，犹如把脉。自己醒悟，才是猛药","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230617/2023061703171710083434.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230617/2023061703171689711317.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230617/2023061703171707166785.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D27早起上了两节课，匆忙去给孩子买午饭，打发了孩子才能有时间做自己想做的事。赶在孩子画画课之前磨一下手，意犹未尽","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230616/2023061611212899549566.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230616/202306161121287574270.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230616/2023061611212870136229.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D26努力的意义就是，当好运降临到自己头上时，你会觉得“我配”。而不是眼看着好事降临到别人身上，你只会跟着说“我呸”","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230615/2023061511374265639905.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230615/2023061511374247686269.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230615/2023061511374244481646.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D35超级热的一天，今天找了两个字来检验自己横线和竖线的质量，确实问题多多的，比如着急行笔会导致铺豪太满字有毛边，起笔和收笔也很毛糙。接下来利用这两个字找出来的问题，继续线条的练习吧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230614/2023061402534111942166.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230614/2023061402534112547721.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230614/2023061402534110770952.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D24睡饱啦！今天的小小进步是呼吸节奏把控的越来越好，收笔越来越自然（这个纸太皱啦）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230613/2023061303411966430281.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230613/202306130341199865218.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230613/2023061303411968090543.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D23脑子里有个小人说，你困了你该休息了。另外一个小人说，不，你不困你还可以坚持。我真的困了，今天就到这里吧","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230612/2023061204175523521254.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230612/2023061204175529824620.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230612/2023061204175528136794.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D22今天的小小进步：控制好铺豪的力度，竖线会苗条。\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230611/202306111034147205243.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230611/2023061110342721253422.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"d21今天的斑马线上来了一位不速之客，大概是被这稠密的线条整晕了，出不去了哈哈哈","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230610/2023061003490552833513.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230610/2023061003490520079082.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230610/2023061003490538166066.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D20又凑了个整数，解救强迫症的打卡记录！今天的小小进步：被群里一个小小少年的发言深深震撼到，我这个老阿姨真的自愧不如。生活还是很美好的，活着就是赚到了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230609/2023060902293038078996.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230609/202306090229308926193.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230609/2023060902293089433891.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D19今天终于不发烧啦！身体好状态才能更好！赶紧起来拉两张竖线，第一张找手感，第二张绝绝子哈哈。今天的小小进步：起笔和收笔越来越好，竖线越来越直","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230608/2023060803011291223145.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230608/2023060803011281527707.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D18连续两天发烧烧的迷迷糊糊，状态太糟糕。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230607/2023060701323898869886.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D17平心静气，不急不躁，方有所获。
宜：认真对待每一次练习
忌：三天打鱼两天晒网
忌：闷头傻练不思考不总结","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230607/2023060707021489388236.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D16今天的小小进步：把控好呼吸的节奏和手腕的配合，竖线就可以很直","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230605/2023060504061629958600.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230605/2023060504061639616031.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D15今天的小小收获：调整呼吸给大脑一个信号，腿支撑住身体的重心，打开肩膀，手腕放平并与纸保持适当的距离，笔杆与纸保持九十度垂直，下拉的过程中及时调整手腕的高度，线条既可以粗细有度又可以很直。要想不毛边，起笔藏锋时笔尖的毫不要过度铺开。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":854,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230604/2023060411003881397890.jpg","idx":0},{"width":854,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230604/2023060411003883398141.jpg","idx":1},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230604/2023060411003882520846.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D14周末总是最忙碌的时候，我甚至来不及看一次直播答疑，这两天只有练习的时间是属于自己的。今天的小小进步是横线越来越直，竖线也在慢慢进步。这一周落幕，下一周继续努力","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230603/2023060303090853829051.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230603/2023060303090836486712.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230603/2023060303090846638950.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":8,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D13摸索出了竖线有粗有细的原因，明天需要再次确认一下。，今天的进步是竖线的起笔错误越来越少。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230602/2023060210131798245335.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230602/202306021013177115516.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230602/2023060210131792297290.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D12孩子生病撂下毛笔就赶去医院，折腾一天今天未能完成每天两张的量，但是竖线还是有小小进步的，收笔越来越好","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230601/2023060111060202144504.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230601/2023060111060149347971.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230601/2023060111060179775487.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":7,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D11节日快乐！\n今天的小小进步：找到了竖线会歪斜的原因——手腕抬得太高，在竖线行笔到一半时收放不自如。之所以会出现毛边是因为铺豪没有中锋，那么铺豪为什么会有问题呢？还是因为手腕收放不自如！果然手腕灵活才是命门！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230531/2023053103333200692042.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230531/2023053103333212736437.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230531/2023053103333187979528.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":7,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D10旧纸最后两张今天用完了，很欣慰没有一张是浪费的。换了新纸越练兴致越高，竖线慢慢有手感，入笔和收笔也越来越好，继续加油","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230530/2023053004114953982708.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230530/2023053004114941188316.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230530/2023053004114970971852.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D9竖线继续练习，横线也没有放下，问题依然是昨天总结的那些，相较于昨天今天取得的小小进步有：
①找到了一些竖线入笔藏锋的技巧，总算有几根是比较满意的
②知道行笔调整角度了
③横线第二张好棒啊，夸一夸自己！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230529/2023052904264624189819.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230529/2023052904264649121553.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D8尝试了竖线，搭配着横线一起更能发现竖线的问题
①入笔时笔尖没有顶住就着急下压行笔了，而且入笔时过于用力导致起笔那里发了个小芽芽
②行笔时因为视线不佳不能及时调整中锋
③行笔时一定要及时调整笔与纸的角度，行到一半前就要慢慢调整了，尤其是到了最下面，这里总是容易忘
④收笔时因为笔与纸没有垂直，笔尖没办法做到自然收笔，会出现一个非常尖的角，这也是之前写欧楷时最容易出现的问题，到今天终于找到病因了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230528/2023052810352473221749.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D7上了一天班，累的实在不行，趁着孩子洗澡准备打卡。横线拉了一半被叫去给孩子吹头发，也许今天确实是太累了，状态完全不行，总是着急着急着急","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230527/2023052702562264952766.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230527/2023052702562263916979.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D6今天手感不错，起笔和收笔越来越顺，呼吸和行笔节奏更加合拍了，不似刚开始那两天呼吸会影响行笔的节奏。铺豪时还是有些用力过度，导致行笔中笔锋散开的太严重，收笔就会出现不圆润的情况，总之，练习千万不能停！加油！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230526/2023052603371104110394.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4608,"height":3456,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230526/2023052603371134643122.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D5今天心情不爽，冷静了好久才平复\n常看的纪录片还没有更新\n心浮气躁带来的一定是歪七扭八","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230525/2023052501260960889788.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3456,"height":4608,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230525/2023052501260996667227.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D4今天的入笔是真糟糕啊，奇怪的是收笔出奇的好。今天换了一支毛笔，原来写欧楷时没发现它们这么好上手，字不好就嫌弃它们，看来是冤枉笔了。第一张找手感，第二张才算进入状态，其实两张不算多，只要状态找对了写一下午也是不会累的\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230524/2023052411134300095418.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230524/2023052411134298918505.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"D3今天手感其实挺好的，就是心不静，可能是饿了\n浅浅写两张吃点东西，下午接着练","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230523/202305230340562166474.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230523/2023052303405622443794.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天咖啡喝多了，手有点抖\n坐立时呼吸更加平稳，手会更稳当一点\n站立时更加能够直观的感受到手腕的提按，重心调整给横线带来的变化","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230522/2023052202562919595910.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"藏锋不难，收笔不简单，调整呼吸更难\n凡起笔没有写好的，皆是起势不正确","hasMore":false}
